info.author: PTPM
info.name: Chat Ads
info.description: Show your promotional messages on a configurable interval

setting.name: *adInterval
setting.desc: Time to wait before showing the next ad. Default: 300 (5 minutes)

setting.name: *adFile
setting.desc: What file should the script use? Relative path from chatads resource.

setting.name: *defaultColor
setting.desc: What file should the script use? Relative path from chatad resource. Default: #ff3333 (red). Technically it's an ad prefix, so you could also use: #ff3333Ad:
